Wild Tumble Cut.name: Wild Tumble Cut
Wild Tumble Cut.fullText:
Daring Acrobat Attack 11Wild Tumble Cut

With acrobatic flair, you rush in to deliver a vicious cut but are left momentarily off balance.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade, and you must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target gains combat advantage against you until the start of your next turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 89.
Wild Tumble Cut.flavor: With acrobatic flair, you rush in to deliver a vicious cut but are left momentarily off balance.

Flawless Stunt.name: Flawless Stunt
Flawless Stunt.fullText:
Daring Acrobat Utility 12Flawless Stunt

Your concentration and long hours of practice make all the difference in pulling off a trick.

Encounter        Martial
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain a +5 bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the end of your turn.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 89.
Flawless Stunt.flavor: Your concentration and long hours of practice make all the difference in pulling off a trick.
Flawless Stunt.range:
Personal

Effect: You gain a +5 bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the end of your turn.
Flawless Stunt.effect: You gain a +5 bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks until the end of your turn.

Dramatic Finish.name: Dramatic Finish
Dramatic Finish.fullText:
Daring Acrobat Attack 20Dramatic Finish

You drive your blade deep into your wounded foe, knowing you have something in reserve as a follow-up.

Daily        Healing, Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.

Target: One creature

Attack: Dexterity vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 6[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if either you or the target is bloodied.

Effect: If this attack fails to reduce the target to 0 hit points, you can either make a melee basic attack against the target with a +5 bonus to the attack roll or spend a healing surge.

Special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.


Published in Martial Power, page(s) 89.
